title: Ray Reutt
text: Raymond Francis "Buster" Reutt (March 4, 1917 – August 18, 2004) was a professional <a href="American%20football">football</a> player for one season, 1943, in the <a href="National%20Football%20League">National Football League</a>. He was a member of the "<a href="Steagles">Steagles</a>", a team that was the result of a temporary merger between the Eagles and <a href="Pittsburgh%20Steelers">Pittsburgh Steelers</a> due to the league-wide manning shortages in 1943 brought on by <a href="World%20War%20II">World War II</a>. He was also an alumnus of the <a href="Virginia%20Military%20Institute">Virginia Military Institute</a>.
